recommendations.summary: Complete 5-session arc reframing quantum computing through coherence dynamics. Includes 20 testable predictions and 9 proposed experiments.

Complete paradigm shift framing (temporal vs spatial)
Clear 'so what' - fundamentally changes QC design philosophy
NOW EXTENDED by QC Arc 2.0 (Sessions 301-306) - consider combined publication
weaknesses: No experimental validation yet
Requires physics community buy-in on temporal interpretation

recommendations.arc_name: QFT Derivation Arc (Standard Model from Planck Grid)
recommendations.summary: Complete 4-session arc deriving the Standard Model from first principles on a discrete Planck grid. Schrodinger equation from intent transfer, Dirac equation from relativistic treatment, gauge symmetries SU(3)xSU(2)xU(1) from local phase invariance, second quantization from grid modes. Vacuum energy FINITE (solves cosmological constant problem). No renormalization needed with physical Planck cutoff.
strengths: Complete arc (4 sessions) with full derivation hierarchy
Gauge symmetries: SU(3)xSU(2)xU(1) from grid topology (consistent with SM)
Second quantization: Planck grid IS the quantum field
FINITE vacuum energy from lattice sum (solves cosmological constant!)
CPT theorem exact as grid symmetry
Mass shown to be emergent (L<->R coupling), not fundamental
Complete hierarchy: Intent -> Gauge Fields -> Fock Space -> Dirac -> Schrodinger
Connects directly to GR Derivation Arc (same Planck grid)
weaknesses: Grid-based approach similar to lattice QFT - novelty must be argued carefully
Intent-based ontology may face philosophical resistance
No synthesis document explicitly identified (but hierarchy is complete)
SU(3)xSU(2)xU(1) claimed 'from topology' needs rigorous demonstration
No PDFs exported yet
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'first-principles derivation of Standard Model from discrete dynamics on Planck lattice'. Lead with the derivation hierarchy (Intent -> SM). Emphasize FINITE vacuum energy as the headline result (solves one of physics' biggest problems). Frame intent dynamics as a specific realization of discrete quantum gravity, not metaphysics. Combined with GR Arc (when complete), this would demonstrate that BOTH pillars of modern physics emerge from one discrete substrate.
